title: 1- Fr. Theodore Paraskevopoulus at Resurrection of Logos in Toronto, March 2017
description:
Talk 1 of 4, by Fr. Theodore Paraskevopoulus,  at the Resurrection of Logos event in Toronto, March 2017.  The entire discussion surrounded the possibility of the return of the notion of logos into the contemporary world. 
The other speakers were:

2- Jonathan Pageau
3- Dr. Jordan B Peterson
4. Rev. Fr. Geoffrey Ready

You can find more on Christian notions of symbolism and patterns on my website.   

http://pageaucarvings.com/media-and-writings.html

This was originally posted in its entirety on the the channel of Jordan B. Peterson.
https://youtu.be/KVo5hq64B2M
